titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University. MS Or 104: al-Juzʼ al-thānī wa-al-ʻishrūn.

licence.#text: These images and the content of Rare Book and Manuscript Library MS Or 104: al-Juzʼ al-thānī wa-al-ʻishrūn. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. See the Creative Commons Public Domain Mark page for usage details, http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/.

To the extent possible under law, Columbia University, Rare Book & Manuscript Library has waived all copyright and related or neighboring rights to this metadata about Rare Book and Manuscript Library MS Or 104: al-Juzʼ al-thānī wa-al-ʻishrūn.. This work is published from: United States. For a summary of CC0, see https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. Legal code: https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/legalcode.

note: One volume of a 30-part Qur'ān of which RBML holds fifteen volumes under separate shelfmarks (see MS Or. 94 for the primary entry).

msContents.summary: Complete section containing the first word of 33:31 to the final word of 36:27.

supportDesc.extent: 42 foliated leaves : 205 x 155 (140 x 90) mm, bound to 210 x 160 x 15 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Naskh in black ink, fully vocalized; occasional catchwords on verso, lower left.

binding.p: Islamic binding. Full brown leather with central blind stamped mandorla and blind tooled lines. Manuscript paper label on right board with decorative shaped edges. Fore-edge and envelope flap with central stamp and blind tooled lines. Marbled paper separate pastedowns and flap linings.

origin.p: [1085] A.H.; MS Or. 94 from this set lists that date.
